_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four meditators [sn34.16:1.4]: One meditator who is skilled in entering immersion but not in projecting the mind purified by immersion
Another meditator who is skilled in projecting the mind purified by immersion but not in entering immersion
Another meditator who is unskilled in both entering immersion and projecting the mind purified by immersion
Another meditator who is skilled in both entering immersion and projecting the mind purified by immersion
